text: Events from the year 1912 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Nicholas II * Chairman of the Council of Ministers – Vladimir Nikolayevich Kokovtsov ==Events== * Russian Empire at the 1912 Summer Olympics * Brusilov Expedition * Lena massacre * 1912 Russian legislative election ==Births== Leonid Vitaliyevich Kantorovich: a Soviet mathematician and economist, known for his theory and development of techniques for the optimal allocation of resources. ==Deaths== * * * * ==References== 1912 in Russia Category:Years of the 20th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1912 in Russia
